list.description:
#ironsights #sidam #sidam25 #spaag

finished.

custom sight based on the ingame iron sight on the SIDAM-25. dimensions(mills) are not historically accurate but visually the shapes and sizes look logical imo.

the front part of the sight can move if you adjust your rangefinder to "simulate" your head height going down. A complete useless gimmick but its there. (see image 1)
range finder measurements bar has been moved to the far left (see image 3)
the map contains versions 1 and 1.1 which have a different perspective and still have 0-800m horizontal range bars.

How to use against ground targ
#m1abrams sight for #xm1 abrams :D
#m1abrams sight for #centauro #b1centauro. It's ready for deployment, but gaijin need to fix/remove this annoying black circle. so #plzgaijin.
#m1abrams semihistorical sight for #t55am1 requested by @SupremeChancla is here!

Otomatic sight.
Quick and Simple. Helps alot to kill Helicopters camping in space

#otomatic #longrange #spaa #sight #4500m
Want to suggest another marker sight on the Soviet tank is - 4M, Works similarly to my previous sights.

Simple circle sight for anti-aircraft vehicles.

It is zeroed in at 500 meters and the bottom of the circle is 1000 meters. I personally use it with my R3 and the 500 meter zero helps me get more kills.

Update: Made the circle a little thicker so it's easier to see. Not represented in the image.

#circle #simple #aa #aaa #antiair #antiaircraft #anti_air #anti_aircraft #sight #sights #aiming #round #ring #dot #aperture #easy #R3

Ish ya boi again! I was working hard and decided to upload this sight for #t72 #t72a! Russian wet dream is here!
Enjoy! :D

Edit: Fixed text positions
Another M1 Abrams like sight, now for T64A! Yes, that's what it is! Kapitalist sight for Commie tank! Order now and you'll get a 5$ discount! Hope you'll enjoy! #t64a #t64
So, @Z_Smoke wanted a clean sight for #m1abrams #m1abrahms. Here you are bois! As always, two magnifications: first 3x, second 10x :D
Just a Call of duty hitmarker for meme purposes on AH1Z :D Enjoy!

Okay, so i figured out that you can create sights for helis too. Here you have historical monocular eyepiece sight used in WAH64 Apache, for AH1Z :D in container you have two of them, first is truely historical, second is rotated by 45 degrees and in my opinion looks better! :D
Enjoy!

#ah1 #ah1z #viper #historical #sight #helicopter

Прицел для топов.
Риски через 250м.
Выделены часто используемые (мной) расстояния: 1000, 1150, 1300.
Шкала до 5км для зависших вертолетов.
Прицел доработан и перезалит. Маркер прицела выставлен по высоте тигра - 1 .

another experimental sight FOR type 4 HORO. sighting mark for land mines. the maximum range is 700 meters. Dale analog will be used on the SU-152. Warning sight trial. Only works in Zuma without Zuma wanted to adjust to maximum height of the trajectory of the projectile to defeat a target through cover, but not yet obtained. Waiting for your suggestions. I want to warn the sight has an adjustable make of the sight before my sights, only the frame is now at the office of the tank, and the largest of space targets in the vertical marker of pre-emption. Waiting for your suggestions .

Last uptdate: 05-06-2025 Vehicles: 11


Modified sights: M6A1
Added sight: T1E1


Fictionnal sight for tanks with 2 guns.

Use in standard aiming for the main gun, you have the correction for second gun.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)

fictional gun sight for #t95e1
based on GAS(Gunner's Auxiliary Sight) of M1 Abrams
#fictional
Advanced Sturmpanzer II for accurate firing.

I made a gun sight for M3 Bradley, based on Steel beasts M2A2 gun sight.
unzip it and put the folder in to the usersights folder
hope you enjoy it
#m3bradley #m3cfv #realistic

ещё один экспериментальный прицел для ТИП 4 HO-RO. прицельная марка для фугасов. максимальная дальность 700 метров. дале аналог будет использован на СУ-152. Предупреждаю прицел пробный. Работает только в зуме, без зума хотел отрегулировать под максимальную высоту траектории снаряда для поражения цели через укрытия, но пока не получается. Жду ваших предложений. Хочу предупредить прицел имеет регулируемую марку прицела как и до этого мои прицелы, только рамка теперь не по контору танка, а по наибольшей занимаемого пространства цели в маркере вертикального упреждения. Жду ваших предложений .

Пробный упрощенный прицел для Леопарда А1А1-120 для лома, скрин с игры сделать не могу. Прицел для тестирования, пишите в комментариях что добавить или убрать. На основе данного прицела будут добавлены остальные прицелы для советов .

MOSTLY OUTDATED AND I WILL NOT BE UPDATING THEM ANYMORE

I'm also disabling the comments since I'm really not coming back to updating them, if you want to download something that actually works then check for example sights made by Rastmust
https://live.warthunder.com/user/107154207/
...
чтобы вас читаками обзывали #L44#a1a1

FIRE CONTROL SYSTEMS PACK V1.1 (03/20/2019)
#FCS
ATTENTION: This is not my original gun sight design. All credit for the design goes to zRirez at https://live.warthunder.com/user/zRirez/ and the original post https://live.warthunder.com/post/782824/en/ .

I will be working on adding more use for ammunition types, and more top tier vehicles themselves. In the mean time, be patient, this sight has a billion lines of code.

Schindibee's fictional "ANAX" Sight for FIAT-Ansaldo P40

#customsight #sight #fictional #p40 #p26_40 #leoncello #anax

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian P40 tank (atm only the premium "Leoncello" version ,but later for sure also for any regular P40 variants that may be added...), including the following easy-to-use functionalities:

- Ranging scale for armor-piercing ammo, with included deflection aiming help
(for flanked targets moving at 20 km/h, end of lines for 40 km/h...)

- Ranging funnel for armor-piercing ammo (configured for tank lengths of 7m, width of 3.5m, allows pr
